scripting

Class commonsdialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • scripting.commonsdialog

  • public class commonsdialog
extends java.lang.Object
    Module with functions to show simple dialogs.

    • Method Detail

      • msgbox

        public static void msgbox(java.lang.String message,
                          java.lang.String title,
                          int messageType,
                          java.awt.Component root)
        Shows a message dialog with ok button only.
        Valid values for messageType are:
        • FORBIDEN
        • IDEA
        • WARNING
        • QUESTION
        Parameters:
        message -
        title, - optional, title of the dialog
        messageType, - optional, default value is IDEA
        root, - optional, parent Component for this dialog, default values is gvSIG main window.

      • inputbox

        public static java.lang.String inputbox(java.lang.String prompt,
                                        java.lang.String title,
                                        int messageType,
                                        java.lang.String initialValue,
                                        java.awt.Component root)
        Shows a dialog to request a input to the user.
        Valid values for messageType are:
        • FORBIDEN
        • IDEA
        • WARNING
        • QUESTION
        Parameters:
        prompt -
        title, - optional, title of the dialog
        messageType, - optional, default value is IDEA
        initialValue, - optional, default value is ""
        root, - optional, parent Component for this dialog, default values is gvSIG main window.
        Returns:
        the string value entered by the user or None.

      • confirmDialog

        public static int confirmDialog(java.lang.String prompt,
                                java.lang.String title,
                                int optionType,
                                int messageType,
                                javax.swing.JComponent root)
        Shows a dialog to request to the user an answer of YES, NO or CANCEL.
        Valid values for optionType are:
        • YES_NO
        • YES_NO_CANCEL
        • ACCEPT_CANCEL

        Valid values for messageType are:
        • FORBIDEN
        • IDEA
        • WARNING
        • QUESTION
        Parameters:
        prompt -
        title, - optional, title of the dialog
        optionType, - optional, default value is YES_NO
        messageType, - optional, default value is IDEA
        root, - optional, parent Component for this dialog, default values is gvSIG main window.
        Returns:
        YES, NO, CANCEL.

      • filechooser

        public static java.lang.String[] filechooser(int mode,
                                             java.lang.String title,
                                             java.lang.String initialPath,
                                             boolean multiselection,
                                             java.lang.String filter,
                                             boolean fileHidingEnabled,
                                             java.awt.Component root)
        Show an file or folder selector dialog. If multiselection is False, the default value, return the path-name of the selected file or folder. If is True, return a list of the selecteds path-names.
        Return None if the user cancel the action.
        Valid values for mode are:
        • FILES_ONLY
        • DIRECTORIES_ONLY
        Parameters:
        mode -
        title, - optional, title of the dialog
        initialPath, - optional, default value is None
        multiselection, - optional, default value is False
        filter, - optional, default value is None
        fileHidingEnabled, - optional, default value is True
        root, - optional, parent Component for this dialog, default values is gvSIG main window.
        Returns:
        the pathnames selected or None if user cancel.

      • openFileDialog

        public static java.lang.String[] openFileDialog(java.lang.String title,
                                                java.lang.String initialPath,
                                                java.awt.Component root)
        Show a selector dialog for choose a file for reading.
        This is a utility function that call to filechooser.
        Return None if the user cancel the action.
        Parameters:
        title, - optional, title of the dialog
        initialPath, - optional, default value is None
        root, - optional, parent Component for this dialog, default values is gvSIG main window.
        Returns:
        the pathnames selected or None if user cancel.

      • openFolderDialog

        public static java.lang.String[] openFolderDialog(java.lang.String title,
                                                  java.lang.String initialPath,
                                                  java.awt.Component root)
        Show a selector dialog for choose a folder.
        This is a utility function that call to filechooser.
        Return None if the user cancel the action.
        Parameters:
        title, - optional, title of the dialog
        initialPath, - optional, default value is None
        root, - optional, parent Component for this dialog, default values is gvSIG main window.
        Returns:
        the pathnames selected or None if user cancel.

      • saveFileDialog

        public static java.lang.String[] saveFileDialog(java.lang.String title,
                                                java.lang.String initialPath,
                                                java.awt.Component root)
        Show a selector dialog for choose a file for writing.
        This is a utility function that call to filechooser.
        Return None if the user cancel the action.
        Parameters:
        title, - optional, title of the dialog
        initialPath, - optional, default value is None
        root, - optional, parent Component for this dialog, default values is gvSIG main window.
        Returns:
        the pathnames selected or None if user cancel.
